tool_description: This is a sample server for upload image.
name: Upload Image

api_list.name: uploadFile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upload-image2.p.rapidapi.com/UploadFile"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upload-image2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
